title: Andrzej Bednarz
text:
Andrzej Bednarz (born 22 December 1980) is a Polish former professional <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player for <a href="B71%20Sandoy">B71 Sandoy</a>. who plays as a <a href="defender%20%28football%29">defender</a>.
Club career.
After a career exclusively in the first and second Polish divisions, Bednarz signed with <a href="Saba%20Qom%20F.C.">Saba Qom F.C.</a>, becoming the first Pole to play in the <a href="Iran%20Pro%20League">Iran Pro League</a>.
